data.name: Gwenpool
data.description: Hey, Commander, Gwendolyn Poole here! First of all? Huge fan! Second, you can count on me to charge up my New Warrior buddies and unleash mayhem on the battlefield!

starItems.name: Gwenpool
starItems.description: Hey, Commander, Gwendolyn Poole here! First of all? Huge fan! Second, you can count on me to charge up my New Warrior buddies and unleash mayhem on the battlefield!

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Barrier self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target

5.description:
Barrier self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>200%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>

6.description:
Barrier self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear all Barrier on the primary target
If the primary target had Barrier, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health

7.description:
Clear all Barrier on the primary target. If the primary target had Barrier, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health. If primary target did not have Barrier, instead Barrier self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to a random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally that does not have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage instead.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage instead.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Flip a positive effect to a negative effect on each target
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage instead.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage instead.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage instead.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on each target
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage instead.
 > Flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on each target.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>150%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>70%</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage instead.
 > Flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on each target.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>70%</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Clear all negative effects from self.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
Clear all negative effects from self.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear all negative effects from <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Clear all negative effects from self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
Clear all negative effects from self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear all negative effects from <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage.
Clear all negative effects from self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear all negative effects from all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage.
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>180%</color> damage to all enemies
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>550%</color> damage.
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived

1.description:
On <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE</color> <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally. On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, apply an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, heal for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, and clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor
<color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor

2.description:
On <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE</color> <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally. On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color> apply an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to that ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, heal for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, and clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

3.description:
On <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE</color> <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally. On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color> apply an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to that ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, heal for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, and clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

4.description:
On <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE</color> <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally. On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color> apply an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to that ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, heal for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, and clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies, on <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, instead apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Accuracy for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies. On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>, on spawn, instead apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE</color> <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally turn, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to that ally. On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color> apply an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to that ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, heal for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, and clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Accuracy for self and all  <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies.
